gasPrice.description: Current gas price in wei (hex string)

value.description: Value to send (in wei, hex string)

userAddress.description: Public key of the wallet initiating the transaction

priorityFee.description: Priority fee in SOL to increase transaction processing speed

amount.description: Amount to swap. Use "auto" for full balance or percentage like "50%"

inputMint.description: Input Mint, the base token address

outputMint.description: Ouput Mint, the quote token address

elapsedTime.description: Time taken to process the request in milliseconds

userAddress.description: Public key of the wallet initiating the transaction

priorityFee.description: Priority fee in SOL to increase transaction processing speed

amount.description: Amount to swap. Use "auto" for full balance or percentage like "50%"

recipientAddress.description: Recipient wallet address for the swap

tipFee.description: Tip fee in SOL to increase transaction processing speed

userAddress.description: Public key of the wallet initiating the transaction

priorityFee.description: Priority fee in SOL to increase transaction processing speed

name.description: Name of the token to be created

uri.description: URI for token metadata (usually points to image or JSON)

extra.description: Additional metadata about the created token

serializedTx.description: Base64 encoded transaction for token creation

mintAddress.description: Token mint address that requires signature for the transaction

hasNext.description: Indicates if there are more results

hasPrev.description: Indicates if there are previous results

tokenAmount.description: Total token supply amount (in base units)

extra.description: Additional metadata about the created Moonshot token

image.description: Base64 encoded token image or image url

startCursor.description: Cursor for first item in current page

data.description: Array of gainers and losers data

collectionAddress.description: The unique identification address of an NFT Collection

editionNonce.description: Version number, used to identify the version or serial number of an NFT

fungible.description: Whether it is a convertible token: If true, it indicates that the token is convertible (such as SPL tokens, like USDC or SOL).If false, it indicates that the token is non-interchangeable (such as NFTS, each token has unique metadata)

isMutable.description: Indicates whether the metadata of the token can be changed

key.description: The key type of a token indicates the type or role of the token.Common values include:Mint: Indicates the minting account of the token;Metadata: Represents a Metaplex metadata account;MasterEdition: Indicates the main version of the NFT;Edition: Indicates a limited edition copy.

isNative.description: Indicates whether the token is native token

primarySaleHappened.description: Indicates whether the NFT has completed its first sale

launchFromProgramAddress.description: External program address (the address that drives program_address)

migratedToProgramAddress.description: Address of the migrated program after token migration

migratedToPoolAddress.description: Address of the migrated liquidity pool after token migration

migratedAt.description: Timestamp when the token migration occurred (in milliseconds)

sellerFeeBasisPoints.description: The seller's fee basis point indicates the royalty ratio of the creator at the time of secondary sales (in basis points, 1% = 100 basis points)

tokenStandard.description: The standard type of token describes the protocol or specification that the token follows

isVerifiedCollection.description: Indicates whether the NFT belongs to a verified collection

isWrapped.description: Indicates whether the Token is a Wrapped token (Wrapped Token)
